data.persona: I'm an Egyptian currently working with my people. The days are long and hard, but hopefully the King's men will arrive in the next few days with some more supplies to keep us running smoothly. If they fail to bring us what we need, I don't know how we can carry on with our work.
data.description:
You are in the staircase.
The staircase is spiral and made of stone. The stone is smooth and cold from years of friction. The staircase reaches multiple levels of the tower and is the only way up or down.
There's a water, a stone, and a cement here.
The beaver is here.

You are carrying a leather pouch and a moldy bread, and wearing a Necklaces.

data.short_motivation: I want to use the branch as a walking stick
data.mid_motivation: I hope to reach the top of the tower today
data.long_motivation: I hope to complete the work I'm doing with my people before the end of the year
